newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Newcrest buys Telfer area tenements.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Newcrest buys Telfer area tenements.

text.p: Mineral explorer Mineral Commodities NL said on Thursday that Newcrest Mining Ltd had purchased its Telfer region tenements.
Mineral Commodities said the tenements had previously been farmed out to MIM Exploration Pty Ltd which had since relinquished their interests.
The tenements, EL 45/1044, 45/1232, 45/1303, 45/1359 and 45/1443 have been assigned for the following consideration;
- A$10,000 on execution of the agreement
- A$100,000 within two years of the date of the Agreement provided Newcrest still retains part or all of the tenements
- a production royalty of A$10.00 per ounce of gold and a net smelter return of 1.5 percent for base metals.
Out of the above consideration, Mineral Commodities said ten percent was payable to the original vendor in return for him cancelling his existing royalty agreement.
